title: Dry Tortugas National Park: Join Our Friends
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends          The South Florida National Parks Trust The South Florida National Parks Trust was founded in 2002 to improve the quality of life in South Florida by supporting the national parks that define our landscape and enrich our cultureâ€”Everglades National Park, Biscayne National Park and Dry Tortugas National Park in the Florida Keys. Over the past four years, the Trust has funded a series of projects that enhance the visitor experience, promote education, and facilitate volunteerism and community involvement. Click here to learn more about the South Florida National Parks Trust.
